Nature of Involution.quote: The descent of consciousness into matter precedes all evolution. (Sri Aurobindo, The Life Divine)

Process of Involution.quote: From the One come the many, from Spirit descends Matter. (Plotinus, Enneads)

Cosmic Descent.quote: The supreme Reality involves itself into the material universe before evolving back to its source. (Sri Aurobindo)

Divine Descent.quote: The Word became flesh and dwelt among us. (John 1:14)

Stages of Descent.quote: From Sat-Chit-Ananda to Mind to Life to Matter - the great descent of consciousness. (Vedantic tradition)

Purpose of Involution.quote: The One becomes Many to experience Itself in infinite ways. (Kashmir Shaivism)

Hidden Divinity.quote: The Divine is involved in Matter and evolution is its method of self-revelation. (Sri Aurobindo)

Consciousness in Matter.quote: Even in the stone and the atom there is a hidden consciousness waiting to emerge. (The Mother, Collected Works)

Spiritual Descent.quote: The higher must descend to lift the lower. (Theosophy)

Divine Play in Matter.quote: The supreme consciousness plays at being unconscious. (Vedantic teachings)

Cosmic Memory.quote: All possibilities of evolution are involved in the original involution. (Sri Aurobindo)

Seeds of Evolution.quote: Evolution is possible because of what involution has hidden within. (Integral Yoga)

Divine Sleep.quote: The Divine sleeps in minerals, dreams in plants, stirs in animals, and awakens in man. (Rumi)

Veiled Knowledge.quote: All knowledge is veiled within, awaiting its gradual unveiling. (Upanishadic wisdom)

Material Foundation.quote: Matter is Spirit in its maximum involution. (Annie Besant)

Creative Descent.quote: Creation is a progressive self-veiling of the Divine. (Kashmir Shaivism)

Divine Sacrifice.quote: The One sacrifices its unity to become the Many. (Vedic tradition)

Cosmic Necessity.quote: Involution is the necessary predecessor of evolution. (Sri Aurobindo)

Hidden Purpose.quote: In the depths of inconscience lies the supreme consciousness. (The Mother)

Spiritual Mechanics.quote: The descent of consciousness follows precise gradations and laws. (Theosophy)

Divine Strategy.quote: Involution is the divine strategy for the game of evolution. (Sri Aurobindo)

Cosmic Process.quote: First the descent, then the ascent - the twin movements of existence. (Vedantic philosophy)

Universal Pattern.quote: As above, so below - the pattern of involution mirrors evolution. (Hermetic tradition)

Divine Concealment.quote: The supreme Reality conceals itself to play the game of discovery. (Kashmir Shaivism)

Evolutionary Basis.quote: Without involution, there could be no evolution. (Sri Aurobindo)

Cosmic Foundation.quote: The foundation of the manifest universe is laid in the process of involution. (Theosophical teachings)

Divine Darkness.quote: In the heart of darkness lies the seed of divine light. (Tantric wisdom)

Spiritual Architecture.quote: The architecture of the cosmos is first designed in involution. (Esoteric philosophy)

Cosmic Design.quote: The divine plan is encoded in the process of involution. (Integral Yoga)

Ultimate Purpose.quote: The purpose of involution is to make evolution possible. (Sri Aurobindo)
